title: How high is the consumption of mineral fertilisers in the EU?
subtitle: In 2023, 9.3 million tonnes of mineral fertilisers (nitrogen and phosphorus) were used in agricultural production across the EU. This represents a cumulative decline of 20.5% from 2017.
textNote: No data available for Malta and Cyprus. Data for Luxembourg 267.7 mio t. Nitrogen and phosphorus fertilisers greatly enhance crop production, but excessive use may lead to nutrient leaching into the environment, contributing to environmental pollution.
